name: Skycastle
description: Skycastle is a tokenized incubator built to transform small teams into scalable companies. We provide the support, expertise, and alignment required for builders to succeed. The Skycastle Network is built on depth and alignment. At its core are 30 partners—allocators, operators, developers, and marketeers—forming a modular supply chain of expertise that can take any project from ideation to scale. This foundation expands into a Council of 64, invited by Partners to extend reach and amplify impact. With 2 founders and 4 senior advisors, Skycastle becomes a 100-member network working in sync to ensure the success of your project. SKY is a diversified index of everything we build. By holding SKY, you gain exposure to every incubated project, access to network tools, and alignment with a curated pipeline of high-quality builders. When one project wins, the entire network wins.
